name: Data Workspace
text: Repository where (meta)data are harvested from their source archives, quality controlled, semantically annotated, and combined. Sampling and omics metadata, omics processing results, and image metadata are included here

name: Combined data spreadsheets
text: Folder inside the Data Workspace where the combined metadata spreadsheet can be found: observatory, sampling event, image, and omics metadata

name: Documentation
text: ARMS-MBON documentation and templates for labels, observation and image spreadsheets

name: Data release 001
text: Species idenfications, sampling event metdata, image metadata for the first ARMS-MBON dataset submitted to EurOBIS (species observations of the COI marker gene; 2018-2020)

name: Analysis release 001
text: Species identifications and processed sequences from the PEMA analysi of the first ARMS-MBON dataset submitted to EurOBIS (species observations of the COI marker gene; 2018-2020)
